visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: 'Monthly Sales Data', Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be in blue color with a font size of 12px, Y-axis labels should be in green color with a font size of 14px, Data series: Three series with data [1, 3, 2, 4], [5, 2, 3, 1], and [7, 5, 4, 3], Custom colors: Series colors should be ['#FF5733', '#33FF57', '#3357FF'], Additional configurations: Chart should have a white background, legend should be positioned at the bottom of the chart, and there should be a margin of 50px around the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart with specific styling and data series. The chart type is set to 'column', and the title is 'Monthly Sales Data'. The X-axis labels are styled in blue with a font size of 12px, while the Y-axis labels are styled in green with a font size of 14px. The chart includes three data series, each with its own set of data and a custom color. The chart background is white, and the legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart. Additionally, a margin of 50px is applied around the chart to ensure it doesn't appear too cramped.
